front.title: •Yoda's Hope
front.gametext: Deploy on a character. When on the mentor, adds 1 to training destiny draws. If on Yoda, you may lose Effect to search your Reserve Deck and take into hand one card with 'levitation' in the title. Shuffle, cut and replace.
front.lore: 'You must feel the Force around you. Here, between you, me, the tree, the rock, everywhere! Yes, even between the land and the ship.'

pulls: One card with 'levitation' in the title
pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
